verses.text: He that is wounded in the \w stones|strong="H6481"\w*, or hath his privy \w member|strong="H8212"\w* cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w*, shall not \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

A \w bastard|strong="H4464"\w* shall not \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; even to his \w tenth|strong="H6224"\w* \w generation|strong="H1755"\w* shall he not \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

An \w Ammonite|strong="H5984"\w* or \w Moabite|strong="H4125"\w* shall not \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; even to their \w tenth|strong="H6224"\w* \w generation|strong="H1755"\w* shall they not \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*:

\w Because|strong="H1697"\w* they \w met|strong="H6923"\w* you not with \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* and with \w water|strong="H4325"\w* in the \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, when ye came \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*; and because they \w hired|strong="H7936"\w* against thee \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Beor|strong="H1160"\w* of \w Pethor|strong="H6604"\w* of \w Mesopotamia|strong="H0763"\w*, to \w curse|strong="H7043"\w* thee.

Nevertheless the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w would|strong="H0014"\w* not \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w*; but the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* the \w curse|strong="H7045"\w* into a \w blessing|strong="H1293"\w* unto thee, because the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w loved|strong="H0157"\w* thee.

Thou shalt not \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* their \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* nor their \w prosperity|strong="H2896"\w* all thy \w days|strong="H3117"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.\f + \fr 23.6 \ft prosperity: Heb. good\f*

¶ Thou shalt not \w abhor|strong="H8581"\w* an \w Edomite|strong="H0130"\w*; for he \add is\add* thy \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*: thou shalt not \w abhor|strong="H8581"\w* an \w Egyptian|strong="H4713"\w*; because thou wast a \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w* in his \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

The \w children|strong="H1121"\w* that are \w begotten|strong="H3205"\w* of them shall \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* in their \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w generation|strong="H1755"\w*.

¶ When the \w host|strong="H4264"\w* goeth \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* against thine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, then \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* thee from every \w wicked|strong="H7451"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w*.

¶ If there be among you any \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, that is not \w clean|strong="H2889"\w* by reason of uncleanness that \w chanceth|strong="H7137"\w* him by \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, then shall he \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w abroad|strong="H2351"\w* out of the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*, he shall not \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w within|strong="H8432"\w* the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*:

But it shall be, when \w evening|strong="H6153"\w* cometh \w on|strong="H6437"\w*, he shall \w wash|strong="H7364"\w* \add himself\add* with \w water|strong="H4325"\w*: and when the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* is \w down|strong="H0935"\w*, he shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H8432"\w* the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* \add again\add*.\f + \fr 23.11 \ft cometh…: Heb. turneth toward\f*
¶ Thou shalt have a place \w also|strong="H3027"\w* \w without|strong="H2351"\w* the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*, whither thou shalt go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w abroad|strong="H2351"\w*:

And thou shalt have a \w paddle|strong="H3489"\w* upon thy \w weapon|strong="H0240"\w*; and it shall be, when thou wilt \w ease|strong="H3427"\w* thyself \w abroad|strong="H2351"\w*, thou shalt \w dig|strong="H2658"\w* therewith, and shalt turn \w back|strong="H7725"\w* and \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* that which \w cometh|strong="H6627"\w* from thee:\f + \fr 23.13 \ft wilt…: Heb. sittest down\f*

For the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w walketh|strong="H1980"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* of thy \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*, to \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* thee, and to give \w up|strong="H5414"\w* thine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee; therefore shall thy \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* be \w holy|strong="H6918"\w*: that he \w see|strong="H7200"\w* no \w unclean|strong="H6172"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* in thee, and turn \w away|strong="H7725"\w* from \w thee|strong="H0310"\w*.\f + \fr 23.14 \ft unclean…: Heb. nakedness of any thing\f*

¶ Thou shalt not \w deliver|strong="H5462"\w* unto his \w master|strong="H0113"\w* the \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* which is \w escaped|strong="H5337"\w* from his \w master|strong="H0113"\w* unto thee:

He shall \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* with thee, \add even\add* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* you, in that \w place|strong="H4725"\w* which he shall \w choose|strong="H0977"\w* in \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of thy \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*, where it liketh him \w best|strong="H2896"\w*: thou shalt not \w oppress|strong="H3238"\w* him.\f + \fr 23.16 \ft liketh…: Heb. is good for him\f*

¶ There shall be no \w whore|strong="H6948"\w* of the \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, nor a \w sodomite|strong="H6945"\w* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.\f + \fr 23.17 \ft whore: or, sodomitess\f*

Thou shalt not \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* the \w hire|strong="H0868"\w* of a \w whore|strong="H2181"\w*, or the \w price|strong="H4242"\w* of a \w dog|strong="H3611"\w*, into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* for any \w vow|strong="H5088"\w*: for even \w both|strong="H8147"\w* these \add are\add* \w abomination|strong="H8441"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

¶ Thou shalt not lend upon \w usury|strong="H5391"\w* to thy \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*; \w usury|strong="H5392"\w* of \w money|strong="H3701"\w*, \w usury|strong="H5392"\w* of \w victuals|strong="H0400"\w*, \w usury|strong="H5392"\w* of any \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* that is lent upon \w usury|strong="H5391"\w*:

Unto a \w stranger|strong="H5237"\w* thou mayest lend upon \w usury|strong="H5391"\w*; but unto thy \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* thou shalt not lend upon \w usury|strong="H5391"\w*: that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* may \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* thee in all that thou \w settest|strong="H4916"\w* thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* to in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* whither thou \w goest|strong="H0935"\w* to \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* it.

¶ When thou shalt \w vow|strong="H5087"\w* a \w vow|strong="H5088"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, thou shalt not \w slack|strong="H0309"\w* to \w pay|strong="H7999"\w* it: for the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* will \w surely|strong="H1875"\w* \w require|strong="H1875"\w* it of thee; and it would be \w sin|strong="H2399"\w* in thee.
But if thou shalt \w forbear|strong="H2308"\w* to \w vow|strong="H5087"\w*, it shall be no \w sin|strong="H2399"\w* in thee.

That which is gone \w out|strong="H4161"\w* of thy \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* thou shalt \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* and \w perform|strong="H6213"\w*; \add even\add* a freewill \w offering|strong="H5071"\w*, according as thou hast \w vowed|strong="H5087"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, which thou hast \w promised|strong="H1696"\w* with thy \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*.

¶ When thou \w comest|strong="H0935"\w* into thy \w neighbour’s|strong="H7453"\w* \w vineyard|strong="H3754"\w*, then thou mayest \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w grapes|strong="H6025"\w* thy \w fill|strong="H7648"\w* at thine own \w pleasure|strong="H5315"\w*; but thou shalt not \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \add any\add* in thy \w vessel|strong="H3627"\w*.

When thou \w comest|strong="H0935"\w* into the standing \w corn|strong="H7054"\w* of thy \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w*, then thou mayest \w pluck|strong="H6998"\w* the \w ears|strong="H4425"\w* with thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*; but thou shalt not \w move|strong="H5130"\w* a \w sickle|strong="H2770"\w* unto thy \w neighbour’s|strong="H7453"\w* standing \w corn|strong="H7054"\w*.
